snippet.title: Python Tutorial - Functions
snippet.description:
Learn how to define and call your own functions in Python. Named parameters, default arguments, and return values are all covered in this lesson.

Watch the full playlist: Learn Python - Build a Cookbook - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8vmUTz6it5A&list=PLEtC2iwVrNRZdd5HqafuFMWjG-V_i16rO

Learn more about the Cookbook Method: http://www.devdungeon.com/cookbook

Video Transcript: http://www.devdungeon.com/content/python-tutorial-functions

For more tutorials and resources, visit: http://www.devdungeon.com
